import React, { useState } from 'react'; import { Modal, Button } from 'react-bootstrap'; function Header() { const [show, setShow] = useState(false); const closeAbout = () => setShow(false); const showAbout = () => setShow(true); return ( <>

Activities in Sydney #AustraliaLockdown

This map shows popular activities in Sydney during #LockdownAustralia based on Twitter data.
